menu_service.title: Kaalsarp dosh pooja
menu_service.description: A powerful ritual to neutralize the negative effects of Kaalsarp yoga in one's horoscope and bring peace and prosperity.

menu_service.title: Navgrah shanti pooja
menu_service.description: Sacred ceremony to appease the nine planets and harmonize their influences for a balanced and successful life.

menu_service.title: Vastu dosh nivaran pooja
menu_service.description: Ritual to correct Vastu defects in buildings and homes, ensuring positive energy flow and harmony.

menu_service.title: Grah pravesh pooja
menu_service.description: Traditional housewarming ceremony to bless a new home with positive energy and divine protection.

menu_service.title: Satyanarayan Katha Puja
menu_service.description: Auspicious worship of Lord Vishnu, performed for fulfillment of wishes and overall prosperity.

menu_service.title: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra Jaap
menu_service.description: Powerful mantra recitation dedicated to Lord Shiva for good health, longevity, and protection from untimely death.

menu_service.title: Rudrabhishek pooja
menu_service.description: Sacred ablution ceremony of Lord Shiva to seek blessings, remove obstacles, and attain peace.

menu_service.title: Pitra dosh pooja
menu_service.description: Ritual to pacify ancestral spirits and resolve issues arising from ancestral debts or dissatisfaction.

menu_service.title: Bhoomi pooja
menu_service.description: Sacred ground-breaking ceremony performed before starting construction to seek blessings from Mother Earth.

menu_service.title: Namkaran sanskar pooja
menu_service.description: Traditional Hindu naming ceremony for newborns, performed to bestow divine blessings and identity.

menu_service.title: Ganesh chaturthi pooja
menu_service.description: Ceremonial worship of Lord Ganesha during the auspicious Ganesh Chaturthi festival for success and wisdom.

menu_service.title: Annaprasan sanskar pooja
menu_service.description: First rice-eating ceremony for infants, marking the beginning of solid food consumption with divine blessings.

menu_service.title: Vrat Udyapan Pooja
menu_service.description: Concluding ceremony performed after completing a religious vow or fast to seek final blessings.

menu_service.title: Govrdhan pooja
menu_service.description: Worship of the sacred Govardhan hill, symbolizing gratitude to nature and Lord Krishna's divine protection.

menu_service.title: Dhanteras pooja
menu_service.description: Auspicious worship performed during Diwali festival to seek blessings from Goddess Lakshmi for wealth and prosperity.
